xwikidoc.name: Tools
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: XWiki Advanced Administration Tools
xwikidoc.content:
The following pages allow advanced administration of an XWiki or XWiki farm:
{{velocity}} #if(!$xcontext.context) {{warning}}This application is not fully installed. Please visit [[ToolsInstall]] to complete it's installation{{/warning}} #end
== Configuration Tools ==
* [[XWiki Configuration Check>>CheckXWikiConfig]]: tool to check the XWiki configuration and have recommandations. * [[Programming Rights Check>>CheckProgrammingRights]]: tool to check that proper programming rights are set on standard pages
== Activity Tools ==
* [[Show Logs>>ShowLogs]] : Show n number of log lines * [[User Rights Check>>CheckRights]]: tool to check the rights of a specific user * [[Flush XWiki Cache>>FlushCache]]: tool to flush the cache
== Storage Management Tools ==
* [[Used Space>>UsedSpace]]: tool to check the disk space used by your wikis * [[Shrink Recycle Bins>>ShrinkRecycleBins]]: tool to empty the recycle bins of your wikis
== Upgrade Tools ==
* [[Wiki Diff>>WikiDiff]]: tool to check differences between a wiki and a default XAR
== Import/Export Tools ==
* [[Export pages and spaces>>Export]] * [[Export a page from a specific date>>ExportFromDate]] * [[Export a single page>>ExportPage]] * [[Import a single page>>ImportPage]] * [[Large Export on Disk>>LargeExportBySpace]] (recommended for large wikis) * [[Large Import from Disk>>LargeImport]] (recommended for large wikis)
#if($hasProgramming) #set($sqlTools = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage('SQLTools.SQLToolsGroovy')) #set($system = $sqlTools.getXWikiDatabaseSystem($xwiki, $xcontext)) #if($system == "MySQL") == MySQL Tools ==
* [[MySQL Database Encoding Check>>CheckDBEncoding]]: tool to check the MySQL database encoding * [[MySQL Indexes Check>>CheckIndexes]]: tool to check MySQL indexes * [[Run Query>>Query]]: tool to run queries on the MySQL database * [[Sanity Check>>SanityCheck]]: tool to check the consistency of the database #else {{warning}}It seems you're not using a MySQL Database. According tools won't be listed.{{/warning}} #end #end {{/velocity}}

== Configuration Tools ==
* [[XWiki Configuration Check>>CheckXWikiConfig]]: tool to check the XWiki configuration and have recommandations. * [[Programming Rights Check>>CheckProgrammingRights]]: tool to check that proper programming rights are set on standard pages

== Upgrade Tools ==
* [[Wiki Diff>>WikiDiff]]: tool to check differences between a wiki and a default XAR
== Import/Export Tools ==
* [[Export]] : Export pages and spaces * [[ExportFromDate]] : Export from a specific date * [[ExportPage]] : Export one page * [[ImportPage]] : Import one page * [[LargeExport]] : Export current wiki on disk (recommended for large wikis) * [[LargeImport]] : Import from disk (recommended for large wikis)
#if($hasProgramming) #set($sqlTools = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage('SQLTools.SQLToolsGroovy')) #set($system = $sqlTools.getXWikiDatabaseSystem($xwiki, $xcontext)) #if($system == "MySQL") == MySQL Tools ==
